rukus.text: 87|1|Tumi tomara sumahana pratipalakara namara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa
87|2|yijane srsti karaiche, tara pichata suthama karaiche.
87|3|Arau yijane (bhagya) nirdharana karaiche tara pichata satpatha pradarsana karaiche
87|5|tara pichata se'iboraka ka'la abarjanata parainata karaiche.
87|6|Anatipalame ami tomaka patha karaama, phalata tumi napaharaiba
87|7|kerala allahe yi bicarae tara bahirae. Niscaya te'om prakasya arau aprakasya sakalo jane.
87|8|Arau ami tomara babe sahaja patha sugama karai dima.
87|9|Eteke upadesa diya, yadi upadesa phalaprasu haya
87|10|upadesa siye'i grahana karaiba yiye bhaya karae.
87|11|Arau yi hatabhagya si iyaka agraahya karaiba
87|13|Tara pichata si tata mrtyubarano karaiba noraaraiba arau jiraita'o thakiba noraaraiba.
87|14|Niscaya saphalata labha karaiba yiye atmasud'dhi karaiba.
87|15|Arau tara pratipalakara nama smarana karaiba arau chalata adaya karaiba.
